manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: After opening the product box，Take the pillow core out of the box, open the plastic bag, take out the product. Leave pillow to sit for 20-30mins,The pillow will slowly rise and firm up. Because our pillowcase is natural bamboo ,the pillow is a natural memory cotton The pillow will have a slight natural odor.Please spred your pillow in a ventilated area for an hour. Double Zippers And Cases Design With 2 zippers decorative case design,you can simply open the zipper ,add or remove the memory foam to find the height that suits you best. The outer case can be cleaned, designed to be simple and easy to clean, giving you a comfortable and healthy sleep. Pillow Material: 52% Polyester 48% Rayon Derived from Bamboo Outer cover made with bamboo derived rayon regulates temperature for comfort and breathable , it's also removable & machine washable.Create a comfortable, constant temperature sleeping environment 90% memory sponge + 10% silk wadding： Our memory foam provides just the right balance between comfort and support Enjoy your sleep with you comfort memory foam pillow, these bed pillows give you the plush feel of luxurious down, soft enough to cradle your head but supportive enough to allow you to comfortably sleep, keeping your spine properly aligned and helping you sleep like a baby.The filling of 10% silk wadding can make the pillow more fluffy and pop up easily, and the product is more soft and comfortable.

ADJUST TO YOUR SLEEP STYLE Side sleeper Try as is Add OR remove foam as needed Back Sleeper Remove abut 1/4 of the foam.Add or remove as needed Stomach Sleeper Remove abut 1/3 of the foam.Add or remove as needed Enjoy your healthy sleep Featuring adjustable filling that allows you to personalize your sleeping comfort and also,memoryfoam technology that provides extra support for a better night’s sleep. CARE INSTRUCTONS Separate outer cover inner pillow before washing both items To wash outer cover and inner pillow Machine wash cold Do not bleachDo not use fabric softner Tumble dry in low heat or air dry in the sun Ensure your pillow and foam filling is com-pletely dry before use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pillow ever!
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is wonderful! I ordered two- one for me and one for my husband and we both love them! The secret is the ability to easily remove some of the filler and customize the pillow to suit your own needs. It comes fairly firm and high but I took about a third of the filling out and it is perfect! Conforms to my head but does not go flat, plumps right up when you shake it and the firmness is perfect now! My husband only took about a quarter of the filling out of his pillow as he likes it firmer than I do and his pillow is now perfect too. Get this pillow you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These pillows are amazing
reviews.reviewText: I have bought and sent back numerous pillows I was a little worried about these at first because they were wrapped so tight they were completely flat I put them in my pillowcase and walked away and when I came back they had filled up the pillow case completely they are nice and firm and they don't lose shape when you lay your head down on them and I've also been told by my partner that I no longer snore so that is a win-win all around I've woken up with a great night's sleep and without any back or neck pain like I did with other pillows I've even tried pillows that said they were for specifically to stop snoring and they did not help these pillows are a win all around

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The are quality pillows
reviews.reviewText: Okay I’m pretty sure these pillow will last us a lifetime. They are the perfect balance of firm and soft. They are large and tall enough to be the only pillow you need. The memory foam is a real memory foam. Great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Removed some of the filling, it’s nice to be able to adjust the fullness/firmness for personalized comfort. Sleep great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely comfortable pillows
reviews.reviewText: A very good value for the price - the pillows look and feel great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my teen son and he really loved how comfortable they are. They’re very soft and I would say doughy if that makes sense for a pillow. They did have a chemical smell when removed from the air sealed bags but it was gone with in the first 10 minutes. Definitely will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cooling, yes. Comfortable, no.
reviews.reviewText: I’m a side sleeper and these just don’t do it for me. There’s no support and I have not removed any memory foam. My stomach sleeper husband likes his, but the foam kind of disperses and gives no support for back or side sleepers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this as a secondary back pillow to my sleeping pillow for support when I want a more upright position. The full pillow was too firm and large but I removed about 1/3 of the stuffing and set it aside and the outcome was perfect for what I wanted. I haven’t used it to sleep on directly but the ability to customize it for what you want is great. No smelly odors and comes in two zipper cases. I recommend this for anyone trying to enhance their sleeping experience.

I was very happy when I received the pillows.Fully stuffed and adjustable to my comfortNo odor and very supportiveNot too firm and not too softI am very very picky!!! I love them and will be purchasing 2 more!

Bought these pillows. My boyfriend and I both had to take some of the fill out of the pillows as they were too hard for our liking . Once we did that we both fell in love with the pillows . Super comfy . 10/10 recommend . Slept so good

it took a few days to get used to this new pillow. never had a "shredded" memory foam pillow before. Only knew the flat memory foam ones. plumped up just right. if you are looking at the reviews that claim there is too much foam, disregard those reviews. this pillow is adjustable, there is a zipper to remove and re add the foam. its right there in the product description ADJUSTABLE. The way they ship the pillow makes you think they forgot the pillow and just shipped a roll of plastic wrap, it took a good 4 hours or so to fully plump.
Came in 2 days! Vacuum sealed in a little box. Took about an hour to reach full fluff size. Very comfy so far and feels like good quality for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Forms to your neck and head for good support. Would highly recommend
reviews.reviewText: Forms to your neck and head for good support. Would highly recommend
